attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All employers MUST be made to give accurate details of terms of employment in job advertisement's
ie: working hours, hourly/weekly rates of pay by law, instead of, excellent this, or that.

rejection.details: The main sentence must be a call to action for HM Government not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
